skins.selfIntroduction: I am Dunkerque, 1st Division of the Line of the Vichya Dominion. As you already know, there is no glory in my service history - there is no hiding this fact. However, if you are still willing to use me, I will not let you down.
skins.acquisition: The day when we can all stand together has come at last... It's an honor to be here, Commander. I am Dunkerque - please allow me to become a part of this magnificent fleet.
skins.login: Commander, did you get enough rest?
skins.details: What should I make... Macarons, or Mont-Blanc? Oh my, Commander, you came at just the right time. Why don't you help me decide what confection to make?
skins.secretaryIdle1: There are things in this world that you might never be able to accomplish, but that is no reason to give up hope.
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's not nice to sit around idly in port, but... Strasbourg, who took my place in leading the fleet, must feel even worse about what happened... if only the Army was able to hold out a little longer... *sigh*
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ahh~ Sweets can really take a girl to heaven... C-Commander?! How long have you been here?!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, shall we make some confections together? My home country is world-famous for our sweets, you know?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: What am I going to do with you...

skins.shipDescription: I've been waiting so long for summer... and it's so worth it - the sun, the sand, the waves, and everyone's laughter. Commander, why don't we take this opportunity to enjoy some crullers together?
skins.acquisition: I've been waiting so long for summer... and it's so worth it - the sun, the sand, the waves, and everyone's laughter. Commander, why don't we take this opportunity to enjoy some crullers together?
skins.login: Commander, are you done changing into your swimwear~?
skins.details: Everyone looks like they're having so much fun... I couldn't ask for anything more.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ice-cream based desserts are delicious, but they melt too easily... I might have to bring a cooler with me next time...
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's been a long time since I last was able to enjoy scenery like this without any worries...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, are you done changing? The others are calling for us, let's go play with them!
skins.secretaryTouch: Want to try gazing into the ocean horizon together? It always puts my mind at ease.

skins.JPClientName: 昼下がりのヴィ`ニュス
skins.shipDescription: Don't you simply adore the atmosphere in this place? It's one of my favorites. The desserts here are to die for. Would you like a taste?
skins.acquisition: Don't you simply adore the atmosphere in this place? It's one of my favorites. The desserts here are to die for. Would you like a taste?
skins.login: Here you are, Commander. Oh? Don't worry, I've only just arrived myself.
skins.details: What's your favorite dessert? I can make it for you, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: ......der, Commander! Look at you, staring at me and spacing out again, am I really so captivating? Did the ice in your drink melt?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, shall we go for a stroll? How often do we get to go out on a date? Let's not waste this one sitting around chatting.
skins.secretaryIdle3: When I sit here like this, I sometimes forget I'm a warship... But, to fight for these little moments, that's not such a bad motivation, is it, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Just relax, Commander, we still have plenty of time.
